lead_paragraph: MANDEL--Joseph. The Board and staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum and of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem mourn the death of our dear friend and supporter, Joseph Mandel. Heartfelt condolences to the entire family. Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM; Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board Co-Chairs, AFIM; James S. Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher, Dir, IM; Leah Siegel, Exec Dir, AFIM 1/3
